testcase.name: Test getEmployeesWithFirstName method with existing employees
Test getEmployeesWithFirstName method with non-existing employees
getDepartmentAverageSalary returns successful average salary for each department
getEmployeesByDepartment returns successful headcount of each department
getDepartmentAnnualPayroll returns successful payroll for each department
getMedianSalaryByDepartment returns successfully and gets the median salary of each department
getFirstEmployeesToJoin returns successfully and gets the first employees to join the company
